channel.title: Toplist Request
channel.description:
Fellow moparisthebest
I was wondering if any one could kindly share the released verison of Moparscape toplist software please,
I am not sure if it is still allowed but since it was released i should not see a problem
All the best Gambol Skype: live:spiritsoul1 If it works all okay and very quick to setup, You will be applied a monthly Donation from my self,

item.title: Toplist Request
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Ha @jme hit the nail on the head, I don’t use skype, ask for help here, in a github issue, or on irc.moparisthebest.com from me (nick moparisthebest) or in #mopar there.

Read full topic

item.title: Toplist Request
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

That old man is too busy for private tutoring on skype.

Best way to receive help from this community is to try it first, if it fails you tell us what you’ve done and how you’ve tried to fix it.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Gambol Ryan
item.description:
@Gambol wrote:

Okay Thank you, I highly appreciate it buddy

May you add me on skype by any chance so i can talk and elaborate in more depth please, Would be highly appreciated

all the best
Gambol

item.title: Toplist Request
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Should be able to, all the forum-specific functionality I split into a seperate file:

github.com

moparisthebest/Server-Status-Page/blob/master/ss_sources/forums/smf.php

<?php
/*
MoparScape.org server status page
Copyright (C) 2011  Travis Burtrum (moparisthebest)

This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or modify
it under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License as published by
the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of the License, or
(at your option) any later version.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
GNU Affero General Public License for more details.

You should have received a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License
along with this program.  If not, see <http://www.gnu.org/licenses/>.
*/

if (!defined('SS_PAGE'))
This file has been truncated. show original

Implement those in a file named ‘ipb.php’ or something and everything should just work.

Just keep in mind the AGPL license, you can use it and make as many modifications as you want, but all your code must be released open source too.

Read full topic

thank you for a speedy response mopar you are a blesisng in disguse ,

item.title: Toplist Request
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

It’s been open source for a very long time now:

GitHub

moparisthebest/Server-Status-Page

Server-Status-Page - A PHP project that keeps track of server uptimes and integrates with a SMF forum.

I haven’t used it for awhile, but it used to work last year, good luck

Read full topic
